definitions.definition: Any of several bulbous flowering plants , of the genus Narcissus , having white or yellow cup - or trumpet -shaped flowers, notably the daffodil
A beautiful young man, like the mythological Greek Narcissus

main_definition: Any of several bulbous flowering plants , of the genus Narcissus , having white or yellow cup - or trumpet -shaped flowers, notably the daffodil
secondary_definitions: A beautiful young man, like the mythological Greek Narcissus
